price: 186 Nul ne saurait guider celui qui est abandonné par Allah qui le laisse, au contraire, s’enfoncer aveuglément dans l’impiété.
arabic: مَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَا هَادِيَ لَهُۥۚ وَيَذَرُهُمۡ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: man yuḍ'lili al-lahu falā hādiya lahu wayadharuhum fī ṭugh'yānihim yaʿmahūna
